Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product not only serves its intended purpose but also adds value to your daily routine. Given its unique features and craftsmanship, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering this remarkable item to you for $125. Please let me know if this price aligns with your expectations and budget. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
